byline: Shannon Mullen, Mitchell Hartman, Bruce Johnson, Molly Wood, Mark Garrison, Sam Beard, Noel King and Adrienne Hill
description: Stop stealing secrets and play fair. America airs its business complaints about China at a meeting between the two countries in Washington today. GlaxoSmithKline faces bribery charges in China. And what kind of life is ahead for Edward Snowden in Latin America?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 11, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 11, 2013
teaser: Stop stealing secrets and play fair. America airs its business complaints about China at a meeting between the two countries in Washington today. GlaxoSmithKline faces bribery charges in China. And what kind of life is ahead for Edward Snowden in Latin America?
